doc:
Paul Gleason https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Gleason 0 Paul Xavier Gleason (May 4, 1939 – May 27, 2006) was an American film and television actor, known for his roles on television series such as All My Children and films such as The Breakfast Club, Trading Places, and Die Hard. Paul_Xavier_Gleason ( May_4_,_1939 – May_27_,_2006 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor , known for his_roles on television_series such_as All_My_Children_and_films such_as The_Breakfast_Club , Trading_Places , and Die Hard .
